title: Food
cleaned_text: V tastes even better with: Dios Baco Fino Sherry Jerez, Spain NV · 8 TOASTED DEMI BAGUETTE 8 even better with: 2020 Two Vintners Syrah, Columbia Valley · 16 SEASONAL BURRATA 20 13 Fino Sherry Jerez, Clos de Nouys Chenin Blanc, Vouvray, France · 15 HOUSE CUT FRIES 9 chipotle aïoli, ketchup tastes even better with: Louis Armand Premier Cru Brut, Mareuil-sur-Aÿ, Vallée de la Champagne, PRAWNS 22 herb-garlic butter sauce, with: 2022 Ashan 'Barrel-Fermented' Chardonnay, Columbia Valley, Washington · 15 Soups and Salads add sautéed prawns 9 | 5 TOMATO SOUP tomato, fresh pepper, olive oil drizzle Gamay Noir, Loire Valley, France · 13 LITTLE GEM CAESAR 17 fried crouton, crispy garlic, radicchio, cured black olives, cherry tomato, mama Rosé, Columbia Valley · 12 Sandwiches Served with choice of mixed green salad or house cut fries. substitute soup or sweet potato fries 2 IMPOSSIBLE 'White Lodge' Belgian-Style White Ale Ballard, Washington · 8 MISO BURGER 22 miso honey bacon, smoked gouda, radicchio, roma grilled chicken 7 better with: 2022 Ashan Fermented' Chardonnay, · 15 Burgenland, 45 crispy salmon skin, de Bordeaux, France · 14 * According to the health department, raw or undercooked meat, poultry, seafood, shellfish or
